titles.title: First-Time Home Ownership Made Easy Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a higher purchase price limitation applicable to mortgage subsidy bonds based on median family income.
First-Time Home Ownership Made Easy Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: First-Time Home Ownership Made Easy Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code with respect to tax-exempt mortgage issues to include a specified median family income-based alternative purchase price limitation.
